label: A2B3_tP10_127_g_ah-001
title: Si$_{2}$U$_{3}$ ($D5_{a}$) Structure
comments:
If we consider the Si$_{2}$ dimers as a pseudo-atom then this is a tetragonal distortion of the \href{current_web_home_dir/AB3_cP4_221_a_c-001}{Cu$_{3}$Au ($L1_{2}$) structure}. 
 \href{current_web_home_dir/A2BC2_tP10_127_g_a_h-002}{Mo$_{2}$FeB$_{2}$} is the ternary form of this structure. 
 We use the lattice constants taken by (Remsching, 1992) at 1200$^\circ$C, while the ICSD entry uses what are apparently the room temperature values.
